GCD.Name: Benefic
GCD.Description:
Restores target's HP.
Cure Potency: 500
Additional Effect: 15% chance next Benefic II will restore critical HP
Duration: 15s

GCD.Name: Helios
GCD.Description:
Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.
Cure Potency: 400

GCD.Name: Ascend
GCD.Description: Resurrects target to a weakened state.

GCD.Name: Aspected Benefic
GCD.Description:
Restores target's HP.
Cure Potency: 250
Additional Effect: Regen
Cure Potency: 250
Duration: 15s

GCD.Name: Combust III
GCD.Description:
Deals unaspected damage over time.
Potency: 70
Duration: 30s

GCD.Name: Fall Malefic
GCD.Description: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 270.

GCD.Name: Gravity II
GCD.Description: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 130 to target and all enemies nearby it.

GCD.Name: Macrocosmos
GCD.Description:
Deals unaspected damage to all nearby enemies with a potency of 250 for the first enemy, and 40% less for all remaining enemies.
Additional Effect: Grants Macrocosmos to self and all nearby party members
Duration: 15s
For the effect's duration, 50% of damage taken is compiled.
Restores HP equal to a cure of 200 potency plus compiled damage when the effect expires or upon execution of Microcosmos.
Amount restored cannot exceed the target's maximum HP.
Recast timer cannot be affected by status effects or gear attributes.

GCD.Name: Helios Conjunction
GCD.Description:
Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.
Cure Potency: 250
Additional Effect: Regen
Cure Potency: 175
Duration: 15s

UnderlevelGCD.Name: Malefic
UnderlevelGCD.Description: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 150.

UnderlevelGCD.Name: Combust
UnderlevelGCD.Description:
Deals unaspected damage over time.
Potency: 50
Duration: 30s

UnderlevelGCD.Name: Aspected Helios
UnderlevelGCD.Description:
Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.
Cure Potency: 250
Additional Effect: Regen
Cure Potency: 150
Duration: 15s

UnderlevelGCD.Name: Gravity
UnderlevelGCD.Description: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 120 to target and all enemies nearby it.

UnderlevelGCD.Name: Combust II
UnderlevelGCD.Description:
Deals unaspected damage over time.
Potency: 60
Duration: 30s

UnderlevelGCD.Name: Malefic II
UnderlevelGCD.Description: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 160.

UnderlevelGCD.Name: Malefic III
UnderlevelGCD.Description: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 190.

UnderlevelGCD.Name: Malefic IV
UnderlevelGCD.Description: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 230.

OGCD.Name: Lightspeed
OGCD.Description:
Reduces cast times for spells by 2.5 seconds.
Duration: 15s

OGCD.Name: Essential Dignity
OGCD.Description:
Restores target's HP.
Cure Potency: 400
Potency increases up to 900 as the target's HP decreases, reaching its maximum value when the target has 30% HP or less.
Maximum Charges: 3

OGCD.Name: Astral Draw
OGCD.Description:
Draws the Balance, the Arrow, the Spire, and the Lord of Crowns from your divining deck.
Additional Effect: Restores 20% of maximum MP
Upon execution, Play I changes to The Balance, Play II changes to The Arrow, Play III changes to The Spire, Minor Arcana changes to Lord of Crowns, and Astral Draw changes to Umbral Draw.
Shares a recast timer with Umbral Draw.

OGCD.Name: Umbral Draw
OGCD.Description:
Draws the Spear, the Bole, the Ewer, and the Lady of Crowns from your divining deck.
Additional Effect: Restores 20% of maximum MP
Upon execution, Play I changes to The Spear, Play II changes to The Bole, Play III changes to The Ewer, Minor Arcana changes to Lady of Crowns, and Umbral Draw changes to Astral Draw.
Shares a recast timer with Astral Draw.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
※Astral Draw changes to Umbral Draw when requirements for execution are met.

OGCD.Name: Play I
OGCD.Description: Plays the drawn arcanum after executing Astral Draw or Umbral Draw.</br>Astral Draw Effect: Action changes to The Balance</br>Umbral Draw Effect: Action changes to The Spear

OGCD.Name: Play II
OGCD.Description: Plays the drawn arcanum after executing Astral Draw or Umbral Draw.</br>Astral Draw Effect: Action changes to The Arrow</br>Umbral Draw Effect: Action changes to The Bole

OGCD.Name: Play III
OGCD.Description: Plays the drawn arcanum after executing Astral Draw or Umbral Draw.</br>Astral Draw Effect: Action changes to The Spire</br>Umbral Draw Effect: Action changes to The Ewer

OGCD.Name: Synastry
OGCD.Description:
Generate an aetheric bond with target party member. Each time you cast a single-target healing spell on yourself or a party member, the party member with whom you have the bond will also recover HP equaling 40% of the original spell.
Duration: 20s

OGCD.Name: Divination
OGCD.Description:
Increases damage dealt by self and nearby party members by 6%.
Duration: 20s
Additional Effect: Grants Divining
Duration: 30s

OGCD.Name: Collective Unconscious
OGCD.Description:
Creates a celestial ring 8 yalms around the caster.
Duration: 18s
Additional Effect: Reduces damage taken by 10% for self and any party members within 30 yalms and applies Wheel of Fortune to self and any party members within 8 yalms
Duration: 5s
Wheel of Fortune Effect: Regen
Cure Potency: 100
Duration: 15s
Effects will be applied continuously to self and all party members standing within the celestial ring.
Collective Unconscious effect ends upon using another action or moving (including facing a different direction).
Cancels auto-attack upon execution.

OGCD.Name: Celestial Opposition
OGCD.Description:
Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.
Cure Potency: 200
Additional Effect: Regen
Cure Potency: 100
Duration: 15s

OGCD.Name: Earthly Star
OGCD.Description:
Deploys an Earthly Star in the designated area and grants the effect of Earthly Dominance.
Duration: 10s
Executing Stellar Detonation while under the effect of Earthly Dominance creates a Stellar Burst dealing unaspected damage with a potency of 205 to all nearby enemies. Also restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.
Cure Potency: 540
After 10s, Earthly Dominance effect is changed to Giant Dominance.
Duration: 10s
Waiting 10s or executing Stellar Detonation while under the effect of Giant Dominance creates a Stellar Explosion dealing unaspected damage with a potency of 310 to all nearby enemies. Also restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.
Cure Potency: 720

OGCD.Name: Stellar Detonation
OGCD.Description:
While under the effect of Earthly Dominance, detonates the currently deployed Earthly Star, creating a Stellar Burst that deals unaspected damage with a potency of 205 to all nearby enemies.
Additional Effect: Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members
Cure Potency: 540
While under the effect of Giant Dominance, detonates the currently deployed Earthly Star, creating a Stellar Explosion that deals unaspected damage with a potency of 310 to all nearby enemies.
Additional Effect: Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members
Cure Potency: 720

OGCD.Name: Minor Arcana
OGCD.Description: Plays the drawn arcanum after executing Astral Draw or Umbral Draw.</br>Astral Draw Effect: Action changes to Lord of Crowns</br>Umbral Draw Effect: Action changes to Lady of Crowns

OGCD.Name: Celestial Intersection
OGCD.Description:
Restores own or target party member's HP.
Cure Potency: 200
Additional Sect Effect: Erects a magicked barrier which nullifies damage equaling 200% of the amount of HP restored
Duration: 30s
Maximum Charges: 2

OGCD.Name: Horoscope
OGCD.Description:
Reads your fortune and those of nearby party members, granting them Horoscope.
Duration: 10s
Effect upgraded to Horoscope Helios upon receiving the effects of Helios or Helios Conjunction.
Duration: 30s
Restores the HP of those under either effect when the cards are read a second time or the effect expires.
Horoscope Cure Potency: 200
Horoscope Helios Cure Potency: 400

OGCD.Name: Horoscope
OGCD.Description: Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.</br>Potency is determined by the Horoscope effect of party members. Effect expires upon execution.</br>Horoscope Potency: 200</br>Horoscope Helios Potency: 400

OGCD.Name: Neutral Sect
OGCD.Description:
Increases healing magic potency by 20%.
Duration: 20s
Additional Effect: When casting Aspected Benefic or Helios Conjunction, erects a magicked barrier which nullifies damage
Aspected Benefic Effect: Nullifies damage equaling 250% of the amount of HP restored
Helios Conjunction Effect: Nullifies damage equaling 125% of the amount of HP restored
Duration: 30s
Additional Effect: Grants Suntouched
Duration: 30s

OGCD.Name: Exaltation
OGCD.Description:
Reduces damage taken by self or target party member by 10%.
Duration: 8s
Additional Effect: Restores HP at the end of the effect's duration
Cure Potency: 500

OGCD.Name: Microcosmos
OGCD.Description: Triggers the healing effect of Macrocosmos, restoring HP equal to a cure of 200 potency plus 50% of compiled damage.</br>Amount restored cannot exceed the target's maximum HP.

OGCD.Name: Oracle
OGCD.Description: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 860 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Can only be executed while Divining.

OGCD.Name: Sun Sign
OGCD.Description:
Reduces damage taken by self and nearby party members by 10%.
Duration: 15s
Can only be executed while Suntouched.
